name: $hivalry
description:
This is a simple game I made in five days for mini Ludum Dare #60. It's written in pure Java because I only had an old laptop with me when I was developing it. The graphics and sounds were done by me.

Controls:

-Use ASWD to move

-Left click to stab

-Right click shops to buy

-Press i to open instructions

-Press f to fire your spell

-Hit enter to skip screens

-Hold shift to run

PS: It may work for Linux as well, but I am unsure.
